scenarios.name: Hello World
scenarios.description: Simple three-node process to get started. Start > Do Something > End.

scenarios.name: Approval Workflow
scenarios.description: Multi-step approval with review, decision point, and escalation path.

scenarios.name: Intake Process
scenarios.description: Standard intake flow with validation, assignment, and acknowledgment.

scenarios.name: Blank Canvas
scenarios.description: Empty starting point with just start and end nodes.

scenarios.name: Basic Flow
scenarios.description: Simple linear flow template: Start > Task 1 > Task 2 > Task 3 > End.

scenarios.name: PROCESS-0013 Quality Validation v1.3
scenarios.description: Full three-act workflow: validate plan, execute with self-check protocol, validate output with integration tests and traceability matrix. 55 nodes, streaming dispatch, configurable escalation chains.

scenarios.name: PROCESS-0013 Quality Validation v1.2
scenarios.description: 3-phase validation: Coverage, SPEC fidelity, TASK fidelity. Streaming dispatch, tier escalation, bee round-trip ownership.

scenarios.name: PROCESS-0013 Quality Validation v1.0 (2026-02-26)
scenarios.description: Original 43-node validation process with join-all barrier and git-commit. Preserved for comparison.
